message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a profit too. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $125?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $115?
I'm still a bit far from what I'm comfortable with, but I'm willing to make another concession. How about $130?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not at my target price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $118?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $127?
I can see you're willing to make concessions, but I'm still a bit away from my target. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $123?
I've made several concessions already, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $130. That's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
